original_text: They said to him, ‘John the Baptist wants to know this: Are you the special person that God has promised to send to us? If not, should we still look for someone else?’
korean_text: 예수께 여짜오되 오실 그이가 당신이오니이까 우리가 다른 이를 기다리오리이까

sentences.original_text: John the Baptist wants to know this
sentences.korean_translation: 세례 요한은 이것을 알고 싶어 합니다

sentences.original_text: that God has promised to send to us
should we still look for someone else
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 계속 다른 사람을 찾아야 합니까
